This decision, made in the interest of passengers, follows IndiGo's cancellation of over 750 flights. A high-level inquiry will investigate the disruptions and determine accountability.

title: IPL: New RR captain? Riyan Parag breaks silence after Samson‚Äôs shocking CSK trade

Parag, who captained RR in Samson's absence last season, expressed his readiness for the role but emphasized the management's decision will be made post-auction. He also acknowledged the significant workload leadership entails.

title: ‚ÄòMetaverse‚Äô budget cut: Zuckerberg plans slash resources; company loses $70 billion

This move comes as the company doubles down on artificial intelligence, investing heavily in AI infrastructure and talent acquisition.

title: Savings in several lakhs! How much money has RBI put in your pocket in 2025? Check calculations

Ashwin noted Parag's lack of experience batting at No. 5 or 6, stating the youngster needs to demonstrate adaptability at the domestic level to push for those crucial slots.

title: $300K AI PC: Jensen Huang recalls first supercomputer sale; Musk got it for OpenAI
content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang revealed a significant moment in AI history. He personally delivered the first DGX-1 AI supercomputer to Elon Musk in 2016. This machine went to Musk's non-profit company, which turned out to be OpenAI. This delivery marked a crucial step for Nvidia's AI hardware and OpenAI's foundational research.

title: 'Agreed on economic cooperation plan till 2030': PM Modi in joint statement with Putin - top quotes
content: Prime Minister Modi hailed India-Russia ties as a "North star" in a changing world, announcing an economic cooperation program until 2030. Both nations reaffirmed their commitment to energy security and combating terrorism. Discussions also covered trade, with Russia pledging continued fuel shipments to India's growing economy.

title: IND vs SA: 'Where was the intent?' - Ex-cricketer slams Jadeja, blames knock for Raipur defeat
content: Former India all-rounder Irfan Pathan criticised Ravindra Jadeja's slow batting in the second ODI loss to South Africa. Pathan believes Jadeja's lack of urgency, scoring 24 off 27 balls, cost India crucial runs. Despite centuries from Kohli and Gaikwad, the team failed to capitalise fully, allowing South Africa to chase a formidable target.

title: Cloudflare goes down again: CTO Dane Knecht confirms outage; shares root cause
content: Cloudflare experienced another widespread outage on Friday, affecting major websites like Canva and Zoom. The company's CTO revealed the root cause was disabling logging features to address a React CVE. While services are now restored, this marks the second significant disruption in a month, raising concerns about network stability and prompting further investigation.

title: Frustrated, lying on floors, confused: Videos capture chaos as IndiGo cancels 500+ flights; watch
content: India's aviation sector faced a severe meltdown as IndiGo cancelled over 400 flights, leaving thousands stranded and airports in chaos. Passengers endured long waits and exorbitant fares on other airlines due to the crisis, triggered by cabin crew shortages. IndiGo expects full operational recovery only by February 2026, highlighting a significant disruption.

title: Harvard-trained doctor shares 5 glycolic acid secrets you probably didn‚Äôt know
content: Glycolic acid, a dermatologist-trusted ingredient, offers versatile skincare benefits beyond facial treatments. It effectively combats back acne by dissolving pore buildup, softens rough elbows and knees, and smooths persistent bumps from keratosis pilaris. Additionally, it prevents ingrown hairs and tackles foot odor and calluses by shedding dead skin.

title: Comet 3I/ATLAS reveals glowing coma plasma and dust tails in Juice NavCam images
content: ESA's Juice spacecraft has captured striking new images of Comet 3I/ATLAS, revealing its active coma and distinct plasma and dust tails. While originally designed for Jupiter, Juice's navigation camera provided an early glimpse of the comet's activity. Full scientific data, gathered by five specialized instruments, is expected in February 2026, promising deeper insights into this interstellar visitor.

title: Kobe Bryant slammed by alleged friend, claims he 'wasn‚Äôt a good person'
content: New claims suggest NBA legend Kobe Bryant was not a good person and neglected family and friends. An alleged childhood friend shared disappointment over unmet promises of support. This contrasts with Kobe's documented generosity and mentorship. The allegations have sparked debate online, highlighting the complex nature of his legacy. Kobe's life included both personal challenges and significant positive contributions.

title: Travis Kelce‚Äôs bold Europe comments on Taylor Swift spark future rumors
content: Travis Kelce recently spoke about his trip to Lake Como with Taylor Swift. He described the beautiful scenery and the warmth of the local people. Kelce expressed his joy and wonder at the experience, finding a new appreciation for life's pace. George Clooney also joined the conversation, sharing his own fondness for the Italian region.

title: Los Angeles Lakers vs Toronto Raptors regular season game - Full injury report
content: The Lakers and Raptors face significant injury woes as they clash on December 4, 2025. With Luka Doncic and Marcus Smart out for LA, and Jakob Poeltl and RJ Barrett sidelined for Toronto, depth players will be crucial. This game becomes a test of adaptability and which supporting cast can step up.

title: IND vs SA: ‚ÄòNever shirked responsibility‚Äô; RCB head coach defends under-fire Gambhir
content: Andy Flower, in Dubai for ILT20 commentary and RCB scouting, praised Virat Kohli‚Äôs hunger and ‚Äúincredible standard‚Äù after his back-to-back ODI tons. The RCB coach backed India head coach Gautam Gambhir amid criticism following consecutive home Test series defeats, saying responsibility cannot fall on one man. Flower also urged India to avoid extreme turners, insisting their talent is strong enough to win on sporting pitches.

title: 'Murdered all kids on Ekadashi': Occult omen or mental illness? Disturbing pattern of Haryana's 'killer mom'
content: A mother in Hisar/Panipat is accused of drowning four children, including her own son. While her family and victims' kin suspect occult practices, police point to psychopathic tendencies and a lack of remorse. The accused reportedly confessed to killing children perceived as more beautiful than her own. Authorities are investigating further, dismissing supernatural claims.

title: Starc breaks Pak legend's big record: 'Super Starc!' ‚Äî Wasim Akram posts classy message
content: Mitchell Starc has become the most successful left-arm fast bowler in Test history, surpassing Wasim Akram's 414 wickets with a stellar 6/75 performance. Akram lauded Starc as a worthy successor, but the Australian humbly stated Akram remains the benchmark. Starc now ranks among Australia's top wicket-takers, with his pursuit of further milestones ongoing.

title: IndiGo crisis: Bengaluru couple attends own wedding reception virtually
content: A newlywed couple, stranded in Bhubaneswar due to IndiGo flight cancellations, virtually attended their own wedding reception in Hubballi.  Their parents represented them at the venue, with the couple appearing on a large screen via video call.  This incident highlights the widespread travel chaos caused by airline operational issues, prompting calls for government intervention.

title: Gabrielle Union on infertility as Dwyane Wade had child during split
content: Gabrielle Union revealed the profound devastation she experienced when Dwyane Wade fathered a child with another woman during a 2013 split, especially as she struggled with infertility.  She felt her soul was shattered, believing she had to let Wade go if she didn't pursue surrogacy to give him the family he desired.

title: 5 tiger reserves that offer the strongest chances of seeing a tiger up close
content: India's tiger population is thriving, with five reserves consistently offering the best chances for sightings. Jim Corbett, Kaziranga, Bandhavgarh, Ranthambore, and Periyar stand out due to high densities, abundant prey, and effective conservation. These areas are crucial for ecological studies and provide unparalleled opportunities to witness these magnificent big cats in their natural habitat.

title: Satya Nadella says IQ still matters: Here's what professionals must learn
content: As AI reshapes the workplace, Satya Nadella warns that technical skill alone can‚Äôt guarantee success. He argues that emotional intelligence‚Äîempathy, collaboration, and human connection‚Äîis becoming the decisive career asset. With automation handling analytical tasks, Nadella urges professionals to build adaptability, communication, and interpersonal strength to stay relevant in an increasingly machine-driven economy.

title: Watch: Chaos at Barabati! Fans sprint and break queues for IND‚ÄìSA T20I tickets
content: Thousands of passionate Indian cricket fans descended upon Cuttack's Barabati Stadium for tickets to the India vs. South Africa T20I, resulting in chaotic scenes. A viral video captured a frenzied crowd pushing and surging towards ticket counters, raising concerns about public safety amidst intense demand for the upcoming series.

title: ‚ÄòOpportunity for us‚Äô: RBI governor sees impact of Trump tariffs as ‚Äòminimal‚Äô
content: RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra views US tariffs on Indian economy as a minimal impact, calling it an opportunity for diversification and productivity improvements. Despite a significant 28.5% drop in exports to the US from May to October 2025, the central bank believes the domestic demand-driven economy will emerge stronger.

title: High cholesterol symptoms in legs at night: Warning signs you should never ignore
content: Leg pain, numbness, coldness, swelling, and skin changes, especially at night, can signal high LDL cholesterol. These symptoms indicate reduced blood flow due to arterial plaque buildup, potentially leading to serious heart issues. Early detection through regular monitoring and lifestyle changes is crucial for managing 'bad cholesterol' and protecting your health.

title: ‚ÄòDoomsday plane‚Äô: What is the ‚ÄòFlying Kremlin‚Äô? Putin‚Äôs jet was the most-tracked flight
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin's specially modified Ilyushin Il-80, dubbed the ‚ÄúFlying Kremlin,‚Äù became the world's most tracked flight en route to Delhi. This secure airborne command center, designed for extreme conditions and equipped with advanced communication and defensive systems, underscores Russia's strategic leadership protection.

title: Bomb scare on Dubai‚ÄìHyderabad Emirates flight: Threat email sparks alert; aircraft lands safely at RGIA
content: Hyderabad Airport faced a bomb threat for an Emirates flight from Dubai on Friday, prompting standard safety protocols upon landing. Passengers were safely deplaned after the aircraft was moved to an isolated bay. This incident follows a string of similar threats targeting flights to the city, raising security concerns.

title: Top neurologist reveals the hidden reasons behind a stroke
content: Strokes strike young adults under 45 more often than before, often from sneaky causes missed in routine checkups. While older adults face plaque buildup, youth deal with heart holes, vessel tears, blood clotting glitches, lipid quirks, and silent sugar issues

title: Bigg Boss 19 reveals the first look of its trophy as the top 5 finalists are announced
content: Bigg Boss 19's grand finale is just two days away, with Gaurav Khanna, Tanya Mittal, Amaal Mallik, Pranit More, and Farrhana Bhatt now the Top 5 finalists. The show unveiled its 'Gharwalon ki Sarkaar' themed trophy, incorporating Salman Khan's signature gesture. Malti Chahar's exit followed a heated exchange, leaving the finalists to pick their preferred winner, sparking further arguments.

title: LeBron ends 1,297-game double-digit streak but delivers winning assist vs Raptors
content: LeBron James' record 1,297-game scoring streak ended Thursday night. He chose to pass for a game-winning shot instead of scoring himself. The Los Angeles Lakers secured a 123-120 victory over the Toronto Raptors. James' focus remains on team success. This unselfish play highlights his commitment to winning above personal milestones.

title: Watch: Rasgulla shortage sparks massive brawl at Bihar wedding
content: In Bodh Gaya, a wedding celebration took an unexpected turn when a lack of rasgullas ignited a fierce altercation between the families. The groom's relatives argue that the dessert shortage was the trigger for the uproar, while the bride's family insists that unresolved dowry negotiations were the real cause, leading to injuries and a stalled ceremony.

title: Ashwin decodes Kohli's fiery celebrations; says he is out to prove a point
content: Former India spinner Ravichandran Ashwin believes Virat Kohli is playing with a point to prove after taking whispers about his future to heart. Kohli's animated celebrations and agreement to play the Vijay Hazare Trophy suggest a fierce self-assertion, as he demonstrates renewed technique and ruthless intent, silencing doubts with back-to-back centuries.

title: Alia Bhatt shares glimpses of griha pravesh puja with Ranbir Kapoor
content: Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor moved into their new six-storey Pali Hill bungalow with daughter Raha and Neetu Kapoor. Marking both their griha pravesh puja and Raha‚Äôs third birthday, Alia shared heartfelt photos featuring family rituals, tender moments, and glimpses of their lavish Rs 250-crore Mumbai home.

title: 'Dhurandhar' Twitter review: Fans hail Ranveer Singh as a 'beast' and call the Sanjay Dutt, Akshaye Khanna, Arjun Rampal, Rakesh Bedi starrer 'paisa vasool'
content: Ranveer Singh's highly anticipated spy thriller 'Dhurandhar' has hit cinemas, earning praise for its ensemble cast, gripping plot, and BGM. Netizens are calling it a 'paisa vasool' entertainer, with Ranveer Singh's performance hailed as 'phenomenal' and Akshaye Khanna stealing scenes. Despite a lengthy runtime, the film is predicted to be a box office success.

title: IndiGo cancellations: On-time performance crashes to 8.5%! Over 400 flights cancelled
content: IndiGo's operational crisis deepened as on-time performance plummeted to 8.5% at major airports, leading to widespread cancellations and delays. The airline cancelled hundreds of flights, stranding passengers amidst overwhelming airport conditions. The DGCA has mandated a recovery roadmap, with IndiGo aiming for operational stability by February 2026.

title: 'Vanished in minutes': Kohli fever sells out Vizag ODI; Kaif's post captures frenzy
content: Virat Kohli's sensational return to form, marked by back-to-back centuries, has ignited a nationwide frenzy, selling out the Visakhapatnam ODI against South Africa.  Sluggish ticket sales were reversed overnight, with fans clamoring to witness the phenomenon.  Even high prices couldn't dampen the demand, showcasing Kohli's immense impact on Indian cricket.

title: Grading coaching hires: How Collin Klein fits back at Kansas State
content: the wildest college football coaching cycle -- perhaps ever -- has reached the hiring phase . schools around the Power 4 that fired their coaches in the first two months of the season are targeting candidates and finalizing deals . one of the first major coaches to lose his job was the first noninterim coach to be hired .

title: UFC 323 expert picks, best bets: Can Merab or Pantoja be stopped?
content: merab Dvalishvili will defend his bantamweight title for the fourth time this year . the nine-year veteran from the country of Georgia is taking on former champion Petr Yan . if he gets his hand raised for the 15th consecutive time on Saturday, he'll become the first UFC fighter to win four title fights in a calendar year. pound-for-pound competitor, Alexandre Pantoja (30-5), puts his men's flyweight belt on the line in the co-

title: The Playbook: Shadow Reports, lineup locks for Week 14
content: this column features score projections, over/unders, win probabilities, and easily digestible fantasy advice for seasonlong leagues and DFS . this guide should help you with all sorts of decision-making, including sit/start, last-minute waiver adds and lineup choices .

title: New NFL draft rankings: Miller stacks the top 50 prospects on his board
content: Dante Moore tops his list of 2026 NFL draft QB prospects . the list is based on film study and conversations I've had with scouts and evaluators over the past several months . my rankings by position are at the bottom of the list .

title: Want a Kalen DeBoer 'Black Hoodie of Death'? Good luck
content: "Excuse me," a woman says as she sifted through the endless round racks of Alabama Crimson Tide apparel . "i was hoping to buy him one of those Coach DeBoer Black Hoodies of Death," she says . all those stores do have plenty of something similar .

title: Rating Portugal kit for Ronaldo's final World Cup, other Puma jerseys
content: 42 of the 48 qualifiers confirmed for 2026 world cup draw . a cavalcade of kits will be released in preparation for the event . the event will be staged in Canada, Mexico and the united states next summer .

title: 'Coastal Chaos' and 7-5 Duke:¬†Can the ACC's problems ever get resolved?
content: the ACC's system isn't much different than other conferences, coach says . it's a quirk of modern college football -- sprawling conferences with limited crossover between teams . if the stakes weren't so high, it might be a charming queirk of the conference .

title: Who has the most work to do? Where all 30 teams stand ahead of winter meetings
content: the focus is shifting to every team's retooling effort for 2026 . it's going to have a tough act to follow . the heavy lifting of this hot stove season still lies ahead . for now, we'll check in with our first offseason stock watch .

title: Big day for Detroit offense powers Lions over Cowboys
content: quarterback Jahmyr Gibbs scores his third touchdown to widen the Lions' lead . he says the regular-season homestretch is a "must-win" game . it's the fifth time the team has scored at least 35 points this season .

title: NFL Week 14's fashionable arrivals, featuring Cowboys WR CeeDee Lamb
content: the calendar has turned to December, meaning cozier fits and cooler weather moves in for week 14 of the season . the Dallas Cowboys and Detroit Lions got it started on "Thursday Night Football" the pregame runway is one of the best places to show out .

title: All the news, flips and top moments from the early signing day
content: DT Lamar Brown, the no. 1 overall ESPN 300 recruit, explains his decision to not sign yet after verbally committing to LSU earlier this year . college football's early signing period started Wednesday and runs until Friday . if a prospect doesn't sign a national letter of intent by Friday, the next national signing day for this cycle .

title: Ranking Saturday's fights: Roach-Cruz, Foster-Fulton, more
content: lamont Roach and Isaac "Pitbull" Cruz fight for vacant WBC interim title at 140 pounds . sportsmail runs through the best fights to watch this weekend, from San Antonio to Monte Carlo to the gold coast in Queensland, Australia . a rematch with Gervonta "Tank" Davis failed to happen .

title: ACC/SEC Challenge guide: The best games, from Duke, Arkansas, more
content: the 2025 ACC/SEC Men's Challenge featured a bevy of AP top 25 men's college basketball teams . on Tuesday, the ACC came out swinging, with no. 4 Duke escaping an attempted double-digit comeback by no. 15 Florida by a single point . a one-possession victory for no. 16 North Carolina over no. 18 Kentucky ended the night up 6-2 on the SEC .
